management has indicated that all our Powerball Lottery Winners should
claim their abandoned prize fund which we believe has a processing fee
charge of $800.00 that makes many of our winners abandon their prize fund.

At this moment. I will announce to you that you are only advised to send
$50.00 for the processing fee charge, not $800.00 which is the new policy
from the Powerball Management.

You were fortunate enough to win the prize in the "A" category. To enable
you to claim your prize, a PIN has been provided. The PIN is 00357721.

For you to receive your 1,000,000.00 Dollars (One Million United States
Dollars). Please get in touch with your claim representative as indicated
below. Your payment file will be forwarded to the designated payment bank
once he has completed processing it. The bank will then get in touch with
you to arrange an immediate transfer of your funds to any designated bank
account or Via ATM Debit card.

To prevent duplicate claims, kindly keep your winning Reference Numbers
private.

Your swift response is highly needed to enable the release of your winnings.



*Yours Truly,Promotion ManagerPowerball Casino Online Promotions United
States Of America.*
